data.title: Robin Leamy (bishop) Facts for Kids
data.meta_description: Robin Leamy (bishop) facts. Robin Walsh Leamy SM (27 July 1934 – 1 January 2022)[1] was a New Zealand Roman Catholic prelate. He became a priest in 1958. He was Bishop of Rarotonga from 1984 until 1996.[2] He retired in 2009.[3] He was born in Wellington, New Zealand.
data.text:
Robin Walsh Leamy SM (27 July 1934 – 1 January 2022)[1] was a New Zealand Roman Catholic prelate. He became a priest in 1958. He was Bishop of Rarotonga from 1984 until 1996.[2] He retired in 2009.[3] He was born in Wellington, New Zealand.

Leamy died on 1 January 2022 in Auckland, New Zealand at the age of 87.[1]
